anathema: Torture an unwilling creature, take joy in suffering
edict: Help others through painful changes, offer harsh punishments to the penitent, seek and allow redemption
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Narakaas (The Cleansing Sentence)](/Deities.aspx?ID=672)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 17

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Monitor Demigods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=12)

**Edicts** Help others through painful changes, offer harsh punishments to the penitent, seek and allow redemption

**Anathema** Torture an unwilling creature, take joy in suffering

**Area of Concern**
Atonement, difficult choices, pain

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39)

**Favored Weapon** [Greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=376)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=102), [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=70), [Pain](/Domains.aspx?ID=87), [Sorrow](/Domains.aspx?ID=117)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Introspection](/Domains.aspx?ID=110)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Endure](/Spells.aspx?ID=2348)

- **2nd**
[Slough Skin](/Spells.aspx?ID=2368)

- **4th**
[Rewrite Memory](/Spells.aspx?ID=1655)

</column>
name: Narakaas (The Cleansing Sentence)
religious_symbol: Vertical line intersected by two diagonal lines and capped with a circle
